channel.title: Tabbing songs On Guitar
channel.description:
First song I tabbed for the guitar, and submitted it to www.ultimate-guitar.com Hopefully it gets accepted. Anyways, im here to share my tabs with all you guitarist's out there. All criticism is accepted, please make it it "constructive" though. and please tell me if the tab sounded right or wrong to you as im doing these by ear. This one is maroon 5 - she will be loved. Please give feedback this is my first one! thanks
[b]Tab difficulty: novice[/b] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]SHE WILL BE LOVED - Maroon 5[/b] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Tabbed by:[/b] Anthony (Nightmare97) [b]Email: [/b]acrodox@yahoo.com Feel free to email me with any questions. Tuning: Standard with CAPO on 1st Fret Chords (WITH CAPO): [b]Bm[/b]: 335543 [b]A[/b] : 113331 [b]G [/b] : 355433 [b]D [/b] : 000232 You could play it without a capo but it just sounds better with it. So if you were to play it without one, just play the chords normally, instead of one fret up. Your'e pretty much gonna play the intro the whole song. During the Verse 1 and 2, pluck the 5th string with your thumb, the third string with your pointer finger (index) and second string with middle finger. Sounds OK without middle finger, but for the real deal, use it. Well here we go ! [b] Intro: Bm A (x2) ________ 1st VERSE ________ Bm A Beauty Queen Of Only Eighteen Bm A She Had Some Trouble With Herself Bm A He was always there Too Help Her She Bm A She always belonged to someone else Bm A I drove for miles and miles Bm A And wound up at your door Bm A I've Had you so many Times but Bm A Somehow I want more ________ CHORUS ________ D A I don't mind spending everyday Bm G Out on your corner in the pouring rain D A Look for the girl with the broken smile Bm G Ask her if she wants to stay awhile D A And she will be loved Bm G She will be loved ________ 2nd VERSE ________ Bm A Tap on my window knock on my door Bm A I want to make you feel beautiful Bm A I know I tend to get so insecure Bm A It doesn't matter anymore Bm A It's not always rainbows and butterflies Bm A It's compromise that moves us along Bm A My heart is full and my door's always open Bm A You can come anytime you want ________ CHORUS ________ D A I don't mind spending everyday Bm G Out on your corner in the pouring rain D A Look for the girl with the broken smile Bm G Ask her if she wants to stay awhile D A And she will be loved Bm G She will be loved ________ THE BRIDGE ________ Bm A I know where you hide Bm Alone in your car A Know all of the things that make you who you are Bm A I know that goodbye means nothing at all Bm A Comes back and begs me to catch her every time she falls Bm A Tap on my window knock on my door Bm A (one strum and let ring) I want to make you feel beautiful ________ CHORUS ________ D A I don't mind spending everyday Bm G Out on your corner in the pouring rain D A Look for the girl with the broken smile Bm G Ask her if she wants to stay awhile D A And she will be loved Bm G She will be loved D A And she will be loved Bm G She will be loved D A And she will be loved Bm G She will be loved [/b]

item.title: Tabbing songs On Guitar
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

First song I tabbed for the guitar, and submitted it to www.ultimate-guitar.com

Hopefully it gets accepted. Anyways, im here to share my tabs with all you guitarist’s out there. All criticism is accepted, please make it it “constructive” though. and please tell me if the tab sounded right or wrong to you as im doing these by ear.

This one is maroon 5 - she will be loved. Please give feedback this is my first one! thanks

[b]Tab difficulty: novice[/b] 
		     [b]SHE WILL BE LOVED - Maroon 5[/b]

Tabbed by: Anthony (Nightmare97)
Email: acrodox@yahoo.com

Feel free to email me with any questions.

Tuning: Standard with CAPO on 1st Fret

Chords (WITH CAPO):
Bm: 335543
A : 113331
G : 355433
D : 000232

You could play it without a capo but it just sounds better with it. So if you were to play it without one, just play the chords normally, instead of one fret up.

Your’e pretty much gonna play the intro the whole song.
During the Verse 1 and 2, pluck the 5th string with your thumb, the third string with your pointer finger (index) and second string with middle finger.
Sounds OK without middle finger, but for the real deal, use it.

Well here we go !

[b]
Intro: Bm A (x2)

1st VERSE

Bm A
Beauty Queen Of Only Eighteen
Bm A
She Had Some Trouble With Herself
Bm A
He was always there Too Help Her She
Bm A
She always belonged to someone else

Bm A
I drove for miles and miles
Bm A
And wound up at your door
Bm A
I’ve Had you so many Times but
Bm A
Somehow I want more

CHORUS

D A
I don’t mind spending everyday
Bm G
Out on your corner in the pouring rain
D A
Look for the girl with the broken smile
Bm G
Ask her if she wants to stay awhile
D A
And she will be loved
Bm G
She will be loved

2nd VERSE

Bm A
Tap on my window knock on my door
Bm A
I want to make you feel beautiful
Bm A
I know I tend to get so insecure
Bm A
It doesn’t matter anymore
Bm A
It’s not always rainbows and butterflies
Bm A
It’s compromise that moves us along
Bm A
My heart is full and my door’s always open
Bm A
You can come anytime you want

CHORUS

D A
I don’t mind spending everyday
Bm G
Out on your corner in the pouring rain
D A
Look for the girl with the broken smile
Bm G
Ask her if she wants to stay awhile
D A
And she will be loved
Bm G
She will be loved

THE BRIDGE

Bm A
I know where you hide
Bm
Alone in your car
A
Know all of the things that make you who you are
Bm A
I know that goodbye means nothing at all
Bm A
Comes back and begs me to catch her every time she falls

Bm A
Tap on my window knock on my door
Bm A (one strum and let ring)
I want to make you feel beautiful

CHORUS

D A
I don’t mind spending everyday
Bm G
Out on your corner in the pouring rain
D A
Look for the girl with the broken smile
Bm G
Ask her if she wants to stay awhile
D A
And she will be loved
Bm G
She will be loved
D A
And she will be loved
Bm G
She will be loved
D A
And she will be loved
Bm G
She will be loved [/b]
